Literature.Title: Development of a high-throughput strategy for discovery of potent analogues of antibiotic lysocin E
Literature.Author: Itoh H, Tokumoto K, Kaji T, Paudel A, Panthee S, Hamamoto H, Sekimizu K, Inoue M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith ATCC 13709(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus JCM 2416(MIC=>64µg/ml),Bacillus cereus JCM 20037(MIC=>64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis JCM 2499(MIC=>64µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=>64µg/ml)
